name: lapras-mcp-server
long_description: LAPRAS（https://lapras.com）公式 MCP Server。LAPRAS上の求人検索やキャリア閲覧・編集をLLMサービスから直接利用できます。転職活動やキャリア管理を効率化できます。

api_key.title: LAPRAS API Key
api_key.description: API key for LAPRAS. Required for work experience related tools. Get it from https://lapras.com/config/api-key

tools.name: search_job
tools.description: Search jobs with keyword, page number, minimum salary, etc.

tools.name: get_job_detail
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific job

tools.name: get_experiences
tools.description: Get list of work experiences registered in LAPRAS

tools.name: create_experience
tools.description: Add new work experience to LAPRAS

tools.name: update_experience
tools.description: Update existing work experience in LAPRAS

tools.name: get_job_summary
tools.description: Get job summary registered in LAPRAS

tools.name: update_job_summary
tools.description: Register or update job summary in LAPRAS

tools.name: get_want_to_do
tools.description: Get future career aspirations registered in LAPRAS

tools.name: update_want_to_do
tools.description: Register or update future career aspirations in LAPRAS
